haya hathara nodanna numbaalata thrasthawadin wannata bala karana rataka hida jiwithaya beragena thawath ratakata eemata haki wiya.namuth ema rateda sulu pirisak numbaalata thrasthawadin wimata bala kara atha.namuth darawane ee ratema sinhala muslim demala minissu 32 dedenekuge kunu kandakata yatawunu malakadan ma dutuwemi.eda mata owun samaga satan karaddi owun siyalu dena minisun misa bedunu jathikathwayan lesa nosithuni.manda deshasimaka hirawunu ek jathikathwayak wenuwen nowa me punchi grahalokaye sama assaka mullakama sitina minisunge wimukthiya wenuwen aragala kala yuthu bawata wu darshanayak akura kara athi bawini.
